name: Legalwise
description:
Our mission is to improve efficiency, minimize risks, save time and reduce costs. At Legalwise we believe that the right blend of common law trained lawyers, processes and technology delivers expected results. Our meticulous security measures ensure utmost data security and confidentiality.
Since its inception in 2006, the company has been delivering legal support services to a diverse range of customers such as banks, corporate law firms, international publishing houses, public construction companies, financial services companies, restaurants, credit reporting and manufacturing companies.
